messages.subject: an advantage of repetition
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/22/02 1:07:05 PM, craun@velocitus.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/22/02 1:07:05 PM, craun@... writes:

<< My point was the same people saying the same things about the same 1 line.
Everyone saying that correcting IMs is not unschooling spelling. I think
that was said so many times it was just getting old. >>

Oh... and one more thing about repetition. Sometimes the quicker to respond
get jumped on personally and individually, and others shy away from saying
"Well I would have written the same thing." So sometimes for me it's a
relief for five others to say the same thing. It keeps people from attacking
me (or any one of them) just for being the first and maybe only.

Sandra
